localizedMeta.description:
Man up and get a girlfriend! Choose your route carefully and win the heart of a special girl or you might end up a level 30 wizard.

Package size: 30 MB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:
Number of players for local play: 1 Player

Supported interfaces/sensors
- Controller / On-screen controller

Supported languages:
English(United States)/English(United Kingdom)

Copyright (C) 2012-2014 by cupholderJones. All Rights Reserved
